## UtteranceTest interface

An utterance test consists of the utterance under test and the expected result.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface UtteranceTest 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [expected?](./stentor-models.utterancetest.expected.md) | [ExpectedResult](./stentor-models.expectedresult.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> The expected result once the utterance is passed in the NLU |
|  [utterance](./stentor-models.utterancetest.utterance.md) | string | The utterance to be tested |
